February 11, 2021 - Buy it from John Lewis using Topcashback or Quidco. I'm really trying to kill my Amazon habit. ... We bought a £2k tv from J Lewis in September. Within 6 weeks it went wrong. J Lewis did nothing, they told us to ring Sony to take it away, have it repaired and be without a tv for the 2 months the repair would take during lockdown!! Unbelievable and unacceptable! We spent hours ringing Sony and J Lewis complaining, in the end Sony exchanged it for a brand ...
